//√ÅV
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define in(i)scanf("%lld", &i);


ll n, t;

int main(){
	in(t);
	while (t--){
		in(n);
		
		int ans = 0, a1=-2, last, one=0;
		for (int i = 0; i <= 32; i++){
			if ((((1LL) << i)&n) !=0)ans++, last=i, one++;
		}
		if (one == 1){
			cout << last-1<< endl;
			continue;
		}
		ans += last-1;
		for (int i = 0; i <last; i++){
			if ((((1LL) << i)&n) !=0){
				a1 += 2;
				ans--;
				if (a1 > ans){
					ans++;
					break;
				}
			}
			else a1++;
			if (a1 > ans)break;

		}

		cout << ans<<endl;
	}
}
